title: Advanced electrolytes for high-performance aqueous zinc-ion batteries
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00584H, Review Article
Jie Wei, Pengbo Zhang, Jingjie Sun, Yuzhu Liu, Fajun Li, Haifeng Xu, Ruquan Ye, Zuoxiu Tie, Lin Sun, Zhong Jin
This review presents an comprehensive overview of various advanced aqueous electrolytes for aqueous zinc-ion batteries, including “water-in-salt” electrolytes, aqueous eutectic electrolytes, molecular crowding electrolytes, and hydrogel electrolytes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
